thread.title: 1 day in Paris to see city with family
thread.title_full: 1 day in Paris to see city with family - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: NPEMDAD
title: 1 day in Paris to see city with family
text:
The good-great location-super friendly staff-great lobby level bar
The “eh”-rooms are a bit dated-floors are super confusing when you try and locate your room (maybe the most confusing I’ve ever found)
All it all a good-not great hotel
